00021 #include "pixel.h"
00022 
00023 pixel_t pixel_get( int x, int y, const unsigned char* pix, unsigned slice, unsigned pixel, int dx, int dy, int opt_tes)
00024 {
00025  const unsigned char* p;
00026  unsigned i;
00027  pixel_t v;
00028  
00029  if (opt_tes) {
00030   if (x < 0)
00031    x += dx;
00032   if (x >= dx)
00033    x -= dx;
00034   if (y < 0)
00035    y += dy;
00036   if (y >= dy)
00037    y -= dy;
00038  } else {
00039   if (x < 0)
00040    x = 0;
00041   if (x >= dx)
00042    x = dx - 1;
00043   if (y < 0)
00044    y = 0;
00045   if (y >= dy)
00046    y = dy - 1;
00047  }
00048  
00049  p = pix + (y * slice) + (x * pixel);
00050  
00051  v = 0;
00052  for(i=0;i<pixel;++i)
00053   v |= ((pixel_t)p[i]) << (i*8);
00054  
00055  return v;
00056 }
00057 
00058 void pixel_put(int x, int y, unsigned char* pix, unsigned slice, unsigned pixel, unsigned dx, unsigned dy, pixel_t v)
00059 {
00060  unsigned char* p;
00061  unsigned i;
00062  
00063  p = pix + (y * slice) + (x * pixel);
00064  
00065  for(i=0;i<pixel;++i) {
00066   p[i] = v >> (i*8);
00067  }
00068 }
